cast.overview: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.
cast.title: Forrest Gump

details.biography: Al Harrington was born on December 12, 1935 in Pago Pago, Western Samoa. He was an actor, known for Forrest Gump (1994), Hawaii Five-0 (2010) and Jake and the Fatman (1987). He was previously married to Rosa. He died on September 21, 2021 in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA.
details.name: Al Harrington
